name: Bloody and cruel story of toys
name_original: Bloody and cruel story of toys
description:
Do you love hardcore shooters? I have something to offer you.

A story of war and peace.
Funny and bloody platformer with strategy elements and unpredictable finale.
A game about bloody and cruel story of toys.


[ Music in video: "What You Want (version 2)" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech com) ]
